page.title: 18RELIGION IN WEST OF STROUD
page.content: The main Religion in our part of Stroud is Church of England. Roman Catholicism has the next biggest number of members. These are followed by Methodists, Baptists, Congregationalists and other small church groups. There are four Anglican Churches, two Baptist Churches, two Roman Catholic Churches, one Methodist Church and a Pentecostal Church. There is also a church of Bethel at Stonehouse. There are no meeting places for religions of other cultures. There are active Jehovah's Witnesses in the areas, a Spiritualist group, a Quaker group and a Presbyterian group. For many people, religion plays very little part in their daily lives except for christenings, marriages and funerals.
